import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update inventory actions by query"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple inventory actions matching a query filter with the same update values.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Use Case**: Useful for bulk updates like correcting unit costs across multiple actions or updating descriptions.

**Workflow**:
1. Build a query filter to identify target actions
2. Preview matching records using [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-actions)
3. Prepare the update object with new values
4. Submit the query-based update request

**Updatable Fields**: `Quantity`, `UnitCost`, `Description`, `ActionDate`, `RelatedEntityId`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Query filter and update values to apply to matching actions.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for bulk updating inventory actions by query filter.","properties":{"ActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions of a specific type."},"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions for a specific catalog item."},"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions for a specific inventory stock record."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions at a specific location."},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions related to a specific entity."},"InventoryActionGroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions belonging to a specific group key."},"Update":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory action. Contains all fields from the InventoryAction model.","properties":{"InventoryActionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the action (required for updates, generated on create)."},"GroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Optional key for grouping related actions together."},"InventoryActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the type of action."},"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the stock entry to affect."},"RelatedEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier describing the related entity type."},"RelatedEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the related entity (e.g., ticket)."},"ActionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the action occurred."},"Quantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Quantity delta to apply (negative for consumption, positive for addition)."},"UnitCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Unit cost recorded for the transaction."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or notes about the action."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryActionRequest"}],"description":"The update values to apply to all matching actions."},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Paging and sorting controls accepted by inventory queries.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Zero-based index of the page to retrieve."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Maximum number of records to return per page."},"SortField":{"type":"string","description":"Inventory field to sort on, such as `Name` or `LocationId`."},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Direction to sort results."}},"title":"InventoryPagingOptions"},"Filters":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Generic filter used across inventory search operations.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the facet to filter on, such as `keyword`, `InventoryItemId`, or `LocationId`."},"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of UUIDs to match when filtering facets that accept identifiers.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Values":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of raw values used when filtering keyword or text facets.","items":{"type":"string"}},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Single-value fallback used by certain legacy facets."}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"InventoryRequestFilter"}}},"required":["Update"],"title":"UpdateInventoryActionsRequest"},"example":{"InventoryId":"dd0380ff-6d1a-ed11-a1f9-000d3a7e102a","Update":{"InventoryActionId":"fc45a960-d0f5-42a8-ac25-075e46f70074","Description":"Bulk updated description"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
